short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block specific words and domains on Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of unwanted content cluttering your Twitter/X feed? Twitter Content Blocker is the solution! This browser extension empowers you to customize your Twitter experience by blocking specific words and domains, ensuring a distraction-free timeline tailored to your preferences.  

Features:  
- Keyword Filtering: Block tweets containing specific words or phrases that annoy you.  
- Domain Blocking: Prevent tweets with affiliate links or unwanted domains from appearing in your feed.  
- Customizable Rules: Add or remove filters easily to suit your needs.  
- Simple and Intuitive Interface: Clean design for seamless setup and management of your blocking preferences.  

Whether you want to avoid intrusive affiliate links, cut out irrelevant content, or maintain focus, Twitter Content Blocker gives you control over what you see on Twitter/X. Say goodbye to distractions and enjoy a streamlined social media experience!
